BiblioEntry.Title: A Nordhaus-Gaddum conjecture for the minimum number of distinct eigenvalues of a graph
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: A Nordhaus-Gaddum conjecture for the minimum number of distinct eigenvalues of a graph / Rupert H. Levene, Polona Oblak, Helena Šmigoc
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V delu podamo Nordhaus-Gaddumovo domnevo za najmanjše število različnih lastnih vrednosti ▫$q(G)$▫ grafa ▫$G$▫: domnevamo, da za vsak graf ▫$G$▫ (razen štirih omenjenih izjem) velja ▫$q(G)+q(G^c)\le |G|+2$▫. V delu izračunamo ▫$q(G^c)$▫ za drevesa ter za vse grafe z lastnostjo ▫$q(G)=|G|-1$▫. Dokažemo, da domneva velja za vsa drevesa, vse uniciklične grafe, vse grafe s ▫$q(G)\le 4$▫ ter vse grafe z ▫$|G|\le 7$▫.

We propose a Nordhaus-Gaddum conjecture for ▫$q(G)$▫, the minimum number of distinct eigenvalues of a symmetric matrix corresponding to a graph ▫$G$▫: for every graph ▫$G$▫ excluding four exceptions, we conjecture that ▫$q(G)+q(G^c)\le |G|+2$▫, where ▫$G^c$▫ is the complement of ▫$G$▫. We compute ▫$q(G^c)$▫ for all trees and all graphs ▫$G$▫ with ▫$q(G)=|G|-1$▫, and hence we verify the conjecture for trees, unicyclic graphs, graphs with ▫$q(G)\le 4$▫, and for graphs with ▫$|G|\le 7$▫.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: inverzni problem lastnih vrednosti /Nordhaus-Gaddumova neenakost /najmanjše število različnih lastnih vrednosti /najmanjši rang /ortogonalne matrike
inverse eigenvalue problem for graphs /Nordhaus-Gaddum inequality /minimum number of distinct eigenvalues /minimum rank /orthogonal matrices

BiblioEntry.Title: Bounds for the completely positive rank of a symmetric matrix over a tropical semiring
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Bounds for the completely positive rank of a symmetric matrix over a tropical semiring [Elektronski vir] / David Dolžan, Polona Oblak

BiblioSet.Title: The electronic journal of linear algebra
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: The electronic journal of linear algebra [Elektronski vir]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku poiščemo zgornjo mejo za CP-rang matrike nad tropskim polkolobarjem glede na pokritje točk grafa, ki ga določajo ničelni elementi matrike, s klikami. Študiramo grafe, ki določajo matrike z najnižjim možnim CP-rangom in dokažemo, da je premer vseh takih grafov enak 2.

In this paper, an upper bound for the CP-rank of a matrix over a tropical semiring is obtained, according to the vertex clique cover of the graph prescribed by the positions of zero entries in the matrix. The graphs that beget the matrices with the lowest possible CP-ranks are studied, and it is proved that any such graph must have its diameter equal to 2.

BiblioEntry.Title: The total zero-divisor graph of commutative rings
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The total zero-divisor graph of commutative rings / Alen Đurić ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Journal of algebra and its applications
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Journal of algebra and its applications

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku definiramo in študiramo totalne grafe deliteljev niča komutativnih kolobarjev z enoto. Ta graf definiramo z obema relacijama, ki izhajata tako iz totalnih grafov kot iz grafov deliteljev niča komutativnega kolobarja. V članku karakteriziramo artinske kolobarje s povezanim totalnim grafom deliteljev niča in izračunamo premere pripadajočih grafov.Poleg tega izračunamo glavne karakteristike totalnega grafa deliteljev niča kolobarja ▫${\mathbb Z}_m$▫ in pokažemo, da sta totalna grafa deliteljev niča kolobarjev ▫${\mathbb Z}_m$▫ in ▫${\mathbb Z}_n$▫ izomorfna natanko tedaj, ko je ▫$m=n$▫.

In this paper we initiate the study of the total zero-divisor graphs over commutative rings with unity. These graphs are constructed by both relations that arise from the zero-divisor graph and from the total graph of a ring. We characterize Artinian rings with the connected total zero-divisor graphs and give their diameters. Moreover, we compute major characteristics of the total zero-divisor graphs of the ring ▫${\mathbb Z}_m$▫ of integers modulo ▫$m$▫ and prove that the total zero-divisor graphs of ▫${\mathbb Z}_m$▫ and ▫${\mathbb Z}_n$▫ are isomorphic if and only if ▫$m=n$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Cholesky decomposition of matrices over commutative semirings
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Cholesky decomposition of matrices over commutative semirings / David Dolžan, Polona Oblak
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku pokažemo, da nad komutativnim polkolobarjem za vsako krepko obrnljivo matriko z nenegativnim numeričnim zakladom obstaja razcep Choleskega.
We prove that over a commutative semiring every symmetric strongly invertible matrix with nonnegative numerical range has a Cholesky decomposition.

BiblioEntry.Title: The maximum of the minimal multiplicity of eigenvalues of symmetric matrices whose pattern is constrained by a graph
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The maximum of the minimal multiplicity of eigenvalues of symmetric matrices whose pattern is constrained by a graph / Polona Oblak, Helena Šmigoc
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Definiramo parameter Mm▫$(G)$▫, ki je enak največji od najmanjših večkratnosti lastnih vrednosti simetričnih matrik prirejenih enostavnemu grafu ▫$G$▫. Navedemo osnovne lastnosti in izračunamo vrednosti Mm▫$(G)$▫ za nekaj družin grafov ▫$G$▫.

In this paper we introduce a parameter Mm▫$(G)$▫, defined as the maximum over the minimal multiplicities of eigenvalues among all symmetric matrices corresponding to a graph ▫$G$▫. We develop basic properties of Mm▫$(G)$▫ and compute it for several families of graphs.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: teorija grafov /linearna algebra /simetrične matrike /večkratnost lastne vrednosti /minimalni rang /graf
graph theory /linear algebra /symmetric matrix /multiplicity of an eigenvalue /minimal rank /graph

BiblioEntry.Title: The total graphs of finite commutative semirings
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The total graphs of finite commutative semirings / David Dolžan, Polona Oblak
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Anderson in Badawi (J Algebra 320(7):2706-2719) sta leta 2008 karakterizirala vse komutativne kolobarje s totalnimi grafi brez triciklov. V tem članku razširimo te rezultate na področje polkolobarjev in poiščemo karakterizacijo končnih komutativnih polkolobarjev s totalnimi grafi, ki ne vsebujejo triciklov.

Anderson and Badawi (J Algebra 320(7):2706-2719, 2008) characterized all commutative rings having total graphs without any 3-cycles. In this paper we expand those results to the semiring setting and obtain the characterization of finite commutative semirings having total graphs without any 3-cycles.

BiblioEntry.Title: On diameter of the commuting graph of a full matrix algebra over a finite field
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: On diameter of the commuting graph of a full matrix algebra over a finite field / David Dolžan ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku je dokazano, da ima graf komutativnosti matrične algebre nad končnim obsegom premer največ pet, če velikost matrik ni praštevilo ali kvadrat praštevila. Nadalje je dokazano, da je premer grafa komutativnosti matrik sode velikosti natanko štiri. To delno dokaže domnevo, ki so jo postavili Akbari, Mohammadian, Radjavi in Raja v [Linear Algebra Appl. 418 (2006) 161-176].

It is shown that the commuting graph of a matrix algebra over a finite field has diameter at most five if the size of the matrices is not a prime nor a square of a prime. It is further shown that the commuting graph of even-sized matrices over finite field has diameter exactly four. This partially proves a conjecture stated by Akbari, Mohammadian, Radjavi, and Raja [Linear Algebra Appl. 418 (2006) 161-176].

BiblioEntry.Title: Maximal simultaneously nilpotent sets of matrices over antinegative semirings
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Maximal simultaneously nilpotent sets of matrices over antinegative semirings / David Dolžan, Polona Oblak
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Študiramo indeks simultane nilpotentnosti simultano nilpotentne množice matrik nad antinegativnim komutativnim polkolobarjem ▫$S$▫. Najdemo zgornjo mejo tega indeksa in poiščemo nekaj karakterizacij simultano nilpotentnih množic v primerih, ko je ta zgornja meja dosežena. V posebnih primerih antinegativnih polkolobarjev, v katerih so vsi delitelji niča nilpotentni, poiščemo tudi mejo za simultano nilpotentni indeks za vse nemaksimalne simultano nilpotentne množice matrik in določimo njihove kardinalnosti v primerih, ko je ▫$S$▫ končen.

We study the simultaneosly nilpotent index of a simultaneously nilpotent set of matrices over an antinegative commutative semiring ▫$S$▫. We find an upper bound for this index and give some characterizations of the simultaneously nilpotent sets when this upper bound is met. In the special case of antinegative semirings with all zero divisors nilpotent, we also find a bound on the simultaneosly nilpotent index for all non maximal simultaneously nilpotent sets of matrices and establish their cardinalities in case of a finite ▫$S$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: The total graphs of finite rings
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The total graphs of finite rings / David Dolžan, Polona Oblak
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku razširimo študij totalnih grafov ▫$\tau(R)$▫ na nekomutativne končne kolobarje ▫$R$▫. Dokažemo, da je ▫$\tau(R)$▫ povezan graf natanko tedaj, ko ▫$R$▫ ni lokalni kolobar in preverimo, da je v tem primeru ▫$\tau(R)▫$ vedno hamiltonski graf. Najdemo tudi zgornjo mejo za dominacijsko število grafa ▫$\tau(R)$▫ za vse končne kolobarje ▫$R$▫.

In this paper we extend the study of total graphs ▫$\tau(R)$▫ to noncommutative finite rings ▫$R$▫. We prove that ▫$\tau(R)$▫ is connected if and only if ▫$R$▫ is not local, and we see that in that case ▫$\tau(R)$▫ is always Hamiltonian. We also find an upper bound for the domination number of ▫$\tau(R)$▫ for all finite rings ▫$R$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Commuting graphs and extremal centralizers
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Commuting graphs and extremal centralizers / Gregor Dolinar ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku določimo pogoje na centralizatorje matrik ▫$M_n(\mathbb{F})$▫ nad poljubnim obsegom ▫$\mathbb{F}$▫, ki so ekvivalentni pogoju povezanosti grafa komutativnosti ▫$M_n(\mathbb{F})$▫. Znano je, da je za algebraično zaprte obsege ▫$\mathbb{F}$▫ diameter grafa komutativnosti matrične algebre ▫$M_n(\mathbb{F})$▫ vsaj štiri, čim je ▫$n \geq 3$▫. Konstruiramo primer, ko je graf komutativnosti matrične algebre ▫$M_n(\mathbb{F})$▫ nad nezaprtim obsegom ▫$\mathbb{F}$▫ povezan z diametrom vsaj pet.

We determine the conditions for matrix centralizers which can guarantee the connectedness of the commuting graph for the full matrix algebra ▫$M_n(\mathbb{F})$▫ over an arbitrary field ▫$\mathbb{F}$▫. It is known that if ▫$\mathbb{F}$▫ is an algebraically closed field and ▫$n \ge 3$▫, then the diameter of the commuting graph of ▫$M_n(\mathbb{F})$▫ is always equal to four. We construct a concrete example showing that if ▫$\mathbb{F}$▫ is not algebraically closed, then the commuting graph of ▫$M_n(\mathbb{F})$▫ can be connected with the diameter at least five.

BiblioEntry.Title: Graphs that allow all the eigenvalue multiplicities to be even
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Graphs that allow all the eigenvalue multiplicities to be even / Polona Oblak, Helena Šmigoc
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naj bo ▫$G$▫ neusmerjen graf z ▫$n$▫ vozlišči ter ▫$S(G)$▫ množica vseh ▫$n \times n$▫ realnih simetričnih matrik, katerih neničelne izvendiagonalne vrednosti so natanko na mestih, ki ustrezajo povezavam v grafu ▫$G$▫. Inverzni problem lastnih vrednosti za graf ▫$G$▫ je problem iskanja vseh možnih seznamov lastnih vrednosti matirk iz ▫$S(G)$▫. Problem je v splošnem zelo težak in v zadnjem času je študiranih veliko njegovih olajšanih variant, med katerimi je najbolj raziskano iskanje minimalnega ranga matrik iz ▫$S(G)$▫. V članku predstavimo vprašanje, za katere grafe ▫$G$▫ obstaja matrika iz ▫$S(G)$▫, katere karakteristični polinom je kvadrat, t.j. vse lastne vrednosti matrike imajo sodo večkratnost. Problem rešimo za več družin grafov.

Let ▫$G$▫ be an undirected graph on ▫$n$▫ vertices and let ▫$S(G)$▫ be the set of all ▫$n \times n$▫ real symmetric matrices whose nonzero off-diagonal entries occur in exactly the positions corresponding to the edges of ▫$G$▫. The inverse eigenvalue problem for a graph ▫$G$▫ is a problem of determining all possible lists that can occur as the lists of eigenvalues of matrices in ▫$S(G)$▫. This question is, in general, hard to answer and several variations were studied, most notably the minimum rank problem. In this paper we introduce the problem of determining for which graphs ▫$G$▫ there exists a matrix in ▫$S(G)$▫ whose characteristic polynomial is a square, i.e. the multiplicities of all its eigenvalues are even. We solve this question for several families of graphs.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: teorija grafov /linearna algebra /simetrične matrike /lastne vrednosti /največja večkratnost

BiblioEntry.Title: Commutativity preservers via maximal centralizers
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Commutativity preservers via maximal centralizers / Gregor Dolinar ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Bijective maps on matrices over arbitrary fields with sufficiently many elements which preserve commutativity in both direction are classified.

BiblioEntry.Title: Diameters of connected components of commuting graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Diameters of connected components of commuting graphs [Elektronski vir] / David Dolžan, Matjaž Konvalinka, Polona Oblak

BiblioSet.Title: The electronic journal of linear algebra
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: The electronic journal of linear algebra [Elektronski vir]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku izračunamo premere komponent za povezanost grafa komutativnosti za ▫$GL_n(S)$▫, kjer je ▫$n \ge 2$▫ naravno število in ▫$S$▫ komutativen nenegativen polkolobar brez deliteljev niča, razen ko je ▫$n$▫ liho sestavljeno število in ima ▫$S$▫ vsaj dva obrnljiva elementa.

In this paper, diameters of connected components of commuting graphs of ▫$GL_n(S)$▫ are calculated, for an integer ▫$n \ge 2$▫ and a commutative antinegative entire semiring ▫$S$▫, unless ▫$n$▫ is a non-prime odd number and ▫$S$▫ has at least two invertible elements.

BiblioEntry.Title: Extremal matrix centralizers
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Extremal matrix centralizers / Gregor Dolinar ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Matrices with maximal or minimal centralizers are classified over fields with sufficiently large orders.

BiblioEntry.Title: On maximal distances in a commuting graph
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: On maximal distances in a commuting graph [Elektronski vir] / Gregor Dolinar, Bojan Kuzma, Polona Oblak

BiblioSet.Title: The electronic journal of linear algebra
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: The electronic journal of linear algebra [Elektronski vir]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: It is shown that matrices over algebraically closed fields that are farthest apart in the commuting graph must be non-derogatory. Rank-one matrices and diagonalizable matrices are also characterized in terms of the commuting graph.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /linearna algebra /teorija grafov /komutirajoči grafi /matrična algebra /algebraično zaprt obseg /centralizator /razdalja v grafih
mathematics /linear algebra /graph theory /commuting graph /matrix algebra /algebraically closed field /centralizer /distance in graphs

BiblioEntry.Title: The zero-divisor graphs of rings and semirings
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The zero-divisor graphs of rings and semirings / David Dolžan, Polona Oblak

BiblioSet.Title: International journal of algebra and computation
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: International journal of algebra and computation

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Študiramo grafe deliteljev niča kolobarjev in polkolobarjev. Pokažemo, da so vsi grafi deliteljev niča (morda nekomutativnih) polkolobarjev povezani in imajo premer kvečjemu 3. Karakteriziramo vse aciklične grafe deliteljev niča in dokažemo, da v primeru, ko je graf cikličen, je njegov notranji obseg kvečjemu 4. Poiščemo vse ciklične grafe deliteljev niča nad komutativnimi polkobarji z največ enim 3-ciklom in karakteriziramo polne ▫$k$▫-delne ter regularne grafe deliteljev niča. Karakteriziramo tudi vse aditivno krajšljive komutativne polkolobarje in vse komutativne kolobarje, katerih graf deliteljev niča ima natanko en 3-cikel.

In this paper we study zero-divisor graphs of rings and semirings. We show that all zero-divisor graphs of (possibly noncommutative) semirings are connected and have diameter less than or equal to 3. We characterize all acyclic zero-divisor graphs of semirings and prove that in the case zero-divisor graphs are cyclic, their girths are less than or equal to 4. We find all possible cyclic zero-divisor graphs over commutative semirings having at most one 3-cycle, and characterize all complete ▫$k$▫-partite and regular zero-divisor graphs. Moreover, we characterize all additively cancellative commutative semirings and all commutative rings such that their zero-divisor graph has exactly one 3-cycle.

BiblioEntry.Title: On the nilpotent commutator of a nilpotent matrix
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: On the nilpotent commutator of a nilpotent matrix / Polona Oblak
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku preučujemo nilpotentni komutator ▫${\mathcal N}_B$▫ nilpotentne matrike ▫$B$▫. Pokažemo, da ▫${\mathcal N}_B$▫ seka vse nilpotentne orbite za konjugacijo natanko tedaj, ko je ▫$B^2=0$▫. Opišemo neničelne preseke ▫${\mathcalN}_B$▫ z nilpotentnimi orbitami v primeru, ko je matrika ▫$B$▫ reda ▫$n$▫ in ranga ▫$n-2$▫. Podamo tudi nekaj rezultatov o praslikah preslikave, ki slika matriko ▫$B$▫ v maksimalno nilpotentno orbito, ki seka ▫${\mathcal N}_B$▫.

We study the structure of the nilpotent commutator ▫${\mathcal N}_B$▫ of a nilpotent matrix ▫$B$▫. We show that ▫${\mathcal N}_B$▫ intersects all nilpotent orbits for conjugation if and only if ▫$B$▫ is a square-zero matrix. We describe nonempty intersections of ▫${\mathcal N}_B$▫ with nilpotent orbits in the case the ▫$n \times n$▫ matrix ▫$B$▫ has rank ▫$n-2$▫. Moreover, we give some results concerning the inverse image of the map taking ▫$B$▫ to the maximal nilpotent orbit intersecting ▫${\mathcal N}_B$▫.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /linearna algebra /nilpotentna matrika /komutirajoče matrike /nilpotentni komutator /nilpotentna orbita /maksimalna particija
mathematics /linear algebra /nilpotent matrix /commuting matrices /nilpotent commutator /nilpotent orbit /maximal partition

BiblioEntry.Title: Diameters of commuting graphs of matrices over semirings
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Diameters of commuting graphs of matrices over semirings / David Dolžan, Damjana Kokol Bukovšek, Polona Oblak
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Izračunamo premer grafa komutativnosti matrik nad Boolovim polkolobarjem, tropskim polkobarjem in poljubnim komutativnim polkolobarjem, ki vsebuje delitelje niča. Poiščemo tudi spodnjo mejo za premer grafa komutativnosti polgrupe matrik nad poljubnim komutativnim nenegativnim polkolobarjem brez deliteljev niča.

We calculate the diameters of commuting graphs of matrices over the binary Boolean semiring, the tropical semiring and an arbitrary nonentire commutative semiring. We also find the lower bound for the diameter of the commuting graph of the semigroup of matrices over an arbitrary commutative entire antinegative semiring.

BiblioEntry.Title: Noncommuting graphs of matrices over semirings
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Noncommuting graphs of matrices over semirings / David Dolžan, Polona Oblak

AuthorGroup.CorpAuthor: 1st Montreal Workshop on Idempotent and Tropical Mathematics, June 29 to July 3, 2009, University of Montreal, Canada

BiblioSet.Title: Special Issue dedicated to 1st Montreal Workshop
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Special Issue dedicated to 1st Montreal Workshop / edited by James Petar Butkovič ... [et al.]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku obravnavamo diametre in ožine grafov nekomutativnosti polkolobarjev. Za multiplikativno oz. aditivno krajšljive polkobarje pokažemo, da so njihovi grafi nekomutativnosti Hamitonski in določimo njihove diametre in ožine. Poleg tega poiščemo diametre in ožine grafov nekomutativnosti nilpotetnih matrik, neobrnljivih matrik in vseh matrik nad polkobarji. V skoraj vseh primerih pokažemo, da je diameter enak kvečjemu 2 in ožina kvečjemu 3, razen v posebnem primeru ▫$2 \times 2$▫ nilpotentnih matrik.

We study diameters and girths of noncommuting graphs of semirings. For a noncommutative semiring that is either multiplicatively or additively cancellative, we find the diameter and the girth of its noncommuting graph and prove that it is Hamiltonian. Moreover, we find diameters and girths of noncommuting graphs of all nilpotent matrices over a semiring, all invertible matrices over a semiring, all noninvertible matrices over a semiring, and the full matrix semiring. In nearly all cases we prove that diameters are less than or equal to 2 and girths are less than or equal to 3, except in the case of ▫$2 \times 2$▫ nilpotent matrices.

BiblioEntry.Title: Commuting graphs of matrices over semirings
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Commuting graphs of matrices over semirings / David Dolžan, Polona Oblak

AuthorGroup.CorpAuthor: 1st Montreal Workshop on Idempotent and Tropical Mathematics, June 29 to July 3, 2009, University of Montreal, Canada

BiblioSet.Title: Special Issue dedicated to 1st Montreal Workshop
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Special Issue dedicated to 1st Montreal Workshop / edited by James Petar Butkovič ... [et al.]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku obravnavamo diametre in ožine grafov komutativnosti nilpotetnih matrik, obrnljivih matrik in vseh matrik nad polkobarji.
We calculate diameters and girths of commuting graphs of the set of all nilpotent matrices over a semiring, the group of all invertible matrices over a semiring, and the full matrix semiring.

BiblioEntry.Title: Invertible and nilpotent matrices over antirings
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Invertible and nilpotent matrices over antirings / David Dolžan, Polona Oblak
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku karakteriziramo obrnljive marike nad poljubnim komutativnim antikolobarjem ▫$S$▫ z 1 in poiščemo strukturo grupe ▫$GL_n(S)$▫. Poiščemo tevilo nilpotentnih matrik nad celim, komutativnim, končnim antikolobarjem. Dokažemo, da se lahko vsaka nilpotentna ▫$n \times n$▫ matrika nad celim antikolobarjem zapiše kot vsota ▫$\lceil \log_2n \rceil$▫ matrik, katerih kvadrat je enak 0, in poiščemo potrebno število sumandov s kvadratom enakim 0, da se lahko poljubna matrika s sledjo 0 zapiše kot njihova vsota.

In this paper, we characterize invertible matrices over an arbitrary commutative antiring ▫$S$▫ with 1 and find the structure of ▫$GL_n(S)$▫. We find the number of nilpotent matrices over an entire commutative finite antiring. We prove that every nilpotent ▫$n \times n$▫ matrix over an entire antiring can be written as a sum of ▫$\lceil \log_2n \rceil$▫ square-zero matrices and also find the necessary number of square-zero summands for an arbitrary trace-zero matrix to be expressible as their sum.

BiblioEntry.Title: Idempotent matrices over antirings
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Idempotent matrices over antirings / David Dolžan, Polona Oblak
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Študiramo idempotentne matrike nad komutativnim antikolobarjem in podamo karakterizacijo idempotentnih matrik s pomočjo digrafov. Prav tako raziščemo orbite konjugiranega delovanja in poiščemo kardinalnosti orbit osnovnih idempotentov. Dokažemo tudi, da so vsi obrnljivi, linearni operatorji na kvadratnih matrikah velikosti ▫$n$▫ kar konjugirana delovanje v primeru ko je ▫$n \geq 3$▫ in nato podamo še popolno karakterizacijo primera ▫$n=2$▫.

We study the idempotent matrices over a commutative antiring. We give a characterization of idempotent matrices by digraphs. We study the orbits of conjugate action and find the cardinality of orbits of basic idempotents. Finally, we prove that invertible, linear and idempotent preserving operators on ▫$n \times n$▫ matrices over entire antirings are exactly conjugate actions for ▫$n \geqslant 3$▫. We also give a complete characterization of the ▫$2 \times 2$▫ case.

BiblioEntry.Title: On pairs of commuting nilpotent matrices
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: On pairs of commuting nilpotent matrices / Tomaž Košir, Polona Oblak
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naj bo ▫$B$▫ nilpotentna matrika, katere Jordanova kanonična forma je podana s particijo ▫$\lambda$▫. Znano je, da je njen nilpotentni komutator ▫${\mathcal{N}}_B$▫ nerazcepna raznoterost in da obstaja natanko ena particija ▫$\mu$▫, za katero je presek nilpotentne orbite, ki pripada ▫$\mu$▫, in nilpotentnega komutatorja ▫${\mathcal{N}}_B$▫ gosta množica v ▫${\mathcal{N}}_B$▫. Pokažemo, da je preslikava ▫$\mathcal{D}$▫, podana s predpisom ▫${\mathcal{D}}(\lambda) = \mu$▫, idempotentna. S tem odgovorimo na vprašanje, ki sta ga zastavila Basilijeva in Iarrobino in delno odgovorimo tudi na Panyushevo vprašanje. V dokazu bomo uporabili dejstvo, da je za generično matriko ▫$A \in {\mathcal{N}}_B$▫ algebra, generirana z matrikama ▫$A$▫ in ▫$B$▫, Gorensteinova. Zato generični par komutirajočih nilpotentnih matrik generira Gorensteinovo algebro. Opišemo tudi ▫${\mathcal{D}}(\lambda)$▫ v odvisnosti od particije ▫$\lambda$▫ v primeru, ko ima particija ▫${\mathcal{D}}(\lambda)$▫ kvečjemu dva dela.

Let ▫$B$▫ be a nilpotent matrix and suppose that its Jordan canonical form is determined by a partition ▫$\lambda$▫. Then it is known that its nilpotent commutator ▫${\mathcal{N}}_B$▫ is an irreducible variety and that there is a unique partition ▫$\mu$▫ such that the intersection of the orbit of nilpotent matrices corresponding to $\mu$ with ▫${\mathcal{N}}_B$▫ is dense in ▫${\mathcal{N}}_B$▫. We prove that map ▫$\mathcal{D}$▫ given by ▫${\mathcal{D}}(\lambda) = \mu$▫ is an idempotent map. This answers a question of Basili and Iarrobino and gives a partial answer to a question of Panyushev. In the proof, we use the fact that for a generic matrix ▫$A \in {\mathcal{N}}_B$▫ the algebra generated by ▫$A$▫ and ▫$B$▫ is a Gorenstein algebra. Thus, a generic pair of commuting nilpotent matrices generates a Gorenstein algebra. We also describe ▫${\mathcal{D}}(\lambda)$▫ in terms of ▫$\lambda$▫ if ▫${\mathcal{D}}(\lambda)$▫ has at most two parts.

mathematics /linear algebra /commuting matrices /nilpotent matrices /nilpotent commutator /nilpotent orbit /maximal partition /Gorenstein artinian algebra

BiblioEntry.Title: Jordan forms for mutually annihilating nilpotent pairs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Jordan forms for mutually annihilating nilpotent pairs / Polona Oblak
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Karakteriziramo vse možne Jordanove kanonične forme takšnih parov nilpotentnih matrik ▫$(A,B)$▫, za katere velja ▫$AB=BA=0$▫.
We completely characterize all possible pairs of Jordan canonical forms for mutually annihilating nilpotent pairs, i.e. pairs ▫$(A,B)$▫ of nilpotent matrices such that ▫$AB = BA = 0$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Products of commuting nilpotent operators
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Products of commuting nilpotent operators [Elektronski vir] / Damjana Kokol Bukovšek ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: The electronic journal of linear algebra
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: The electronic journal of linear algebra [Elektronski vir]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku karakteriziramo vse matrike, ki so produkt dveh ali več komutirajočih matrik in tiste, ki so produkt dveh komutirajočih matrik z ničelnim kvadratom. Podamo tudi posplošitev za operatorje v neskončnorazsežnem vektorskem prostoru. Karakteriziramo tiste operatorje v Hilbertovem prostoru, ki so produkt dveh komutirajočih operatorjev z ničelnim kvadratom, in tiste operatorje na neskončnorazsežnem vektorskem prostoru, ki so produkt dveh komutirajočih nilpotentnih operatorjev.

We characterize the matrices that are products of two (or more) commuting square-zero matrices and matrices that are products of two commuting nilpotent matrices. We also give a characterization of operators on an infinitedimensional Hilbert space that are products of two (or more) commuting square-zero operators and operators on an infinite-dimensional vector space that are products of two commuting nilpotent operators.

BiblioEntry.Title: The upper bound for the index of nilpotency for a matrix commuting with a given nilpotent matrix
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The upper bound for the index of nilpotency for a matrix commuting with a given nilpotent matrix / Polona Oblak
BiblioEntry.Abstract: We study the set ▫${\mathcal{P(N}}_B)$▫ of all possible Jordan canonical forms of nilpotent matrices commuting with a given nilpotent matrix ▫$B$▫. We describe ▫${\mathcal{P(N}}_B)$▫ in the special case when ▫$B$▫ has only one Jordan block and discuss some consequences. In the general case, we find the maximal possible index of nilpotency in the set of all nilpotent matrices commuting with a given nilpotent matrix. We consider several examples.

BiblioEntry.Title: Orbits of pairs of commuting nilpotent matrices : doctoral thesis
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Orbits of pairs of commuting nilpotent matrices : doctoral thesis / Polona Oblak ; Tomaž Košir, adviser
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: doctoral thesis

Notes.Dissertation: Univ. v Ljubljani, Fak. za matematiko in fiziko, Odd. za matematiko

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V delu proučujemo Jordanove kanonične forme parov komutirajočih nilpotentnih matrik. (1) Določimo natančno zgornjo mejo za indeks nilpotentnosti matrike, ki komutira z dano matriko ▫$B$▫ v odvisnosti od Jordanove kanonične forme matrike ▫$B$▫. (2) Določimo vse možne pare Jordanovih kanoničnih form takšnih nilpotentnih matrik ▫$A$▫ in ▫$B$▫, za katere velja ▫$AB = BA = 0$▫. (3) Karakteriziramo vse matrike, ki jih je mogoče zapisati kot produkt dveh komutirajočih nilpotentnih matrik. (4) Navedemo seznam vseh možnih Jordanovih kanoničnih form nilpotentnih matrik, ki komutirajo z (a) nilpotentno matriko z enim Jordanovim blokom, (b) nilpotentno matriko reda nilpotentnosti 2, (c) ▫$n \times n$▫ nilpotentno matriko, kjer je ▫$n \le 8$▫. (5) Navedemo nekaj možnih Jordanovih kanoničnih form nilpotentnih matrik, ki komutirajo z nilpotentno matriko z dvema Jordanovima blokoma.

In the present thesis, we study the possible Jordan canonical forms for a pair of commuting nilpotent matrices: (1) We give the exact upper bound for the index of nilpotency of a nilpotent matrix commuting with a given nilpotent matrix ▫$B$▫. (2) We characterize all possible pairs of Jordan canonical forms for nilpotent matrices ▫$A$▫ and ▫$B$▫ such that ▫$AB = BA = 0$▫. We characterize all matrices that can be written as a product of two commuting nilpotent matrices.(3) We give complete lists of Jordan canonical forms of nilpotent matrices, commuting with (a) a nilpotent matrix with only one Jordan block, (b) a square-zero matrix, (c) an ▫$n \times n$▫ nilpotent matrix, ▫$n \le 8$▫. (5) We give a large set of possible Jordan canonical forms of a nilpotent matrix, commuting with a nilpotent matrix with two Jordan blocks.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naj bo ▫$G$▫ povezana polenostavna končno razsežna algebraična grupa in ▫$\mathfrak{g}$▫ njena Liejeva algebra z izbranim trikotnim razcepom ▫$\mathfrak{g} = \mathfrak{n} \oplus \mathfrak{h} \oplus \mathfrak{n}^-$▫. V ▫$\mathfrak{g}$▫ fiksirajmo orbito ▫$\mathcal{O}$▫ nilpotentnih elementov za adjungirano delovanje algebraične grupe ▫$G$▫ na ▫$\mathfrak{g}$▫. Orbitalne varietete, ki pripadajo nilpotentni orbiti ▫$\mathcal{O}$▫, so definirane kot nerazcepne komponente preseka ▫$\mathcal{O} \cap \mathfrak{n}$▫. Orbitalne varietete so zanimiv pojem tako s stališča teorije algebraične geometrije, algebraičnih grup kot kombinatorike. Doslej znane lastnosti orbitalnih varietet so večinoma izpeljane iz teorije unipotentnih konjugiranostnih razredov v algebraičnih grupah, ki sta jo v osemdesetih letih prejšnjega stoletja razvila N. Spaltenstein in R. Steinberg. To je kasneje A. Joseph uporabil za edino doslej znano karakterizacijo orbitalnih varietet. Hkrati pa lahko orbitalne varietete v ▫${\mathfrak sl}_n(\Cc)$▫ nazorneje predstavimo s pomočjo standardnih Youngovih tabel in Robinson-Schenstedove teorije.

Let ▫$G$▫ be a connected semisimple finite dimensional algebraic group and ▫$\mathfrak{g}$▫ its Lie algebra. Fix some triangular decomposition ▫$\mathfrak{g} = \mathfrak{n} \oplus \mathfrak{h} \oplus \mathfrak{n}^-$▫. Consider an orbit ▫$\mathcal{O}$▫ in ▫$\mathfrak{g}$▫ of a fixed nilpotent under the adjoint action of ▫$G$▫. The irreducible components of ▫$\mathcal{O} \cap \mathfrak{n}$▫ are called orbital varieties associated to ▫$\mathcal{O}$▫. Orbital varieties plays a key role in the study of primitive ideals in ▫$\mathfrak{U(g)}$▫ and are interesting objects from algebraic and geometric points of view. They appeared for the first time in the works of N. Spaltenstein and R. Steinberg during their studies of unipotent variety of a semisimple algebraic group. This theory was later used by A. Joseph to give the only general description of orbital varieties. On the other hand there exists a nice combinatorial characterization of orbital varieties in ▫${\mathfrak sl}_n(\Cc)$▫ in terms of Young tableaux.

BiblioEntry.Title: Minimalni rang simetričnih matrik : magistrsko delo
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Minimalni rang simetričnih matrik : magistrsko delo / Valentina Herbaj
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: magistrsko delo

Notes.Responsibility: Mentorica Polona Novak, somentor Tomaž Košir
Notes.Dissertation: Univ. Ljubljana, Fak. za matematiko in fiziko, Matematika - izobraževalna smer

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Obravnavamo minimalni rang družine simetričnih matrik z vnaprej predpisanim vzorcrm ničelnih in neničelnih vrednosti. Ekvivalentno lahko to družino podamo z enostavnim grafom. Ogledamo si povezavo med minimalnim rangom in maksimalno večkratnostjo lastnih vrednosti matrik. Določimo minimalni rang za nekatere družine grafov, npr. za polne grafe, polne dvodelne grafe, poti, cikle, drevesa. Karakteriziramo grafe na ▫$n$▫ točkah, ki imajo minimalni rang enak ▫$1, 2, n-2, n-1$▫. Ukvarjamo se z minimalnim rangom za grafe s prereznimi točkami in minimalnim rangom enocikličnih grafov.

We discuss a minimum rank of family of symmetric matrices with given zero-nonzero pattern. This kind of family of matrices we can equally describe with a simple graph. We describe the connection between minimum rank and maximum multiplicity of matrix eigenvalues. We define the minimum rank of some grapg families, for instance, for complete graphs, complete bipartite graphs, paths, cycles, trees. We characterize graphs on ▫$n$▫ vertices, whose minimum rank equals ▫$1, 2, n-2, n-1$▫. We observe the minimum rank for graphs with cut-vertices and minimum rank of unicyclic graphs.
